settings.main_content: Based on your stage of hair loss, scalp type and supplement requirements the following will help you in strengthening and regrowing your hair.

settings.head_Text_2: Traya shampoo is paraben free, natural and fortified with anagain. It has DHT blocking capabilities with niacinamide, biotin and Pea sprout Extract .
settings.li_3: Improves hair strength, shine and thickness
settings.Dosage: Twice a week (Will be finalised by our team of doctors)

settings.head_Text_2: Our unique combination of minoxidil and 3% procapil is a hair growth treatment to strengthen your follicles. It is a clinically proven treatment for pattern hair loss and is used across the world.
settings.Dosage: 1ml twice a day on affected areas. (will be approved by dermatologist)

settings.head_Text_2: A perfect mix for daily vitamin requirements. It also contains biotin and grape seed extracts that help in proliferation of hair follicle.
settings.li_2: Vitamin B3 for skin and hair

settings.head_Text_2: This unique serum is designed to apply to your hair roots, it is light on the scalp and works like magic for hair regeneration.

settings.Dosage: Daily (Will be finalised by our team of doctors)

settings.Dosage: Twice a week (Will be finalised by our team of doctors)

settings.footer_content:
An out of balance dosha is balanced with dietary changes and herbal medicine. These changes are associated with rasa which is taste. Six rasas that need to be balanced are sweet, sour, salty, pungent, bitter and astringent. Following the simple dietary recommendations given by our nutritionist will reveal a healthier and happier you!

A detailed diet plan, above products and a prescription will be shipped to you.

settings.step1: Feel a change in Sleep quality

settings.doc_desc: A renowned dermatologist and cosmetologist, Dr.Sarna has almost a decade of experience treating hair loss and working on hair regrowth. She believes stress management is the key to good health!

A modern-day Vaidya with 11 years of experience, a BAMS graduate from Pune, Dr.Chaubey is also a panchakarma practitioner and a spiritual healer. He has spent years perfecting his preventive hair loss all-natural treatment.
With a degree in Foods and Nutrition, Dr.Menon is our nutrition whisperer! She also believes ‘motility(exercise) is magic’. Her specialization is to help you heal with food.

An assistant professor at the Department of Dermatology, KEM Hospital, Dr. Saini is a merit holder and has an MD (Dermatology, Venereology and Leprosy). Apart from conducting excellent diagnosis and providing treatment, she is an avid marathon runner and enjoys theatre.

who primarily works as an Hair Specialist. Dr Saxena completed her M.D from Government Medical College and Worked as a senior resident at KEM College Mumbai. Dr Dhwani completed her hair hair transplantation training under Indian society of Hair Restoration and boasts the experience of having assisted or performed over 200+ Hair surgeries

settings.name: Siddharth
settings.desc: I was losing a lot of hair due to the lockdown and desperate for a solution, that is when a friend recommended Traya. I gave it a shot and after 4 months of use, I can definitely say that their holistic approach to treating hair loss with both ayurveda and allopathy just works.

settings.name: Anonymous

My motive was to stop further hair loss, after dedicatedly following the plan and one can tell how it has changed my hair. I have baby hair all over my scalp and thicker growth. This is a dream, thank you guys you are the best!
